selectedVerses.text: And he shall stir up his power and his heart against the king of the south with a great army. And the king of the south shall wage war with an exceedingly great and mighty army, but he shall not stand, for plots shall be devised against him.
A worthless man plots evil, and his speech is like a scorching fire.
You have seen all their vengeance, all their plots against me.
"You have heard their taunts, O LORD, all their plots against me.
serving the Lord with all humility and with tears and with trials that happened to me through the plots of the Jews;
